long_description: The lightweight HP Pedal kit from Power Grips includes a pair of aluminum alloy pedals with Power Grips pedal straps attached. Provide a hands-free, easy-exit way to increase pedal power for all levels of mountain bike, road and recumbent riders. No special shoes required. Low-profile aluminum alloy body and cage, sealed cartridge bearings and precision ground chromoly spindle. Straps are impervious to water, mud and freezing temperatures for great all weather use. Includes a pre-set, adjustable bracket which adjusts to fit different shoe sizes; bracket adjusts with a Phillips screwdriver and 8mm Allen wrench.
